panels.description: The hit rate of block cache

targets.expr: sum(rate(edb_engine_cache_efficiency{instance=~"$instance", db="$db", type="block_cache_hit"}[1m])) / (sum(rate(edb_engine_cache_efficiency{instance=~"$instance", db="$db", type="block_cache_hit"}[1m])) + sum(rate(edb_engine_cache_efficiency{instance=~"$instance", db="$db", type="block_cache_miss"}[1m])))

sum(rate(edb_engine_cache_efficiency{instance=~"$instance", db="$db", type="block_cache_data_hit"}[1m])) / (sum(rate(edb_engine_cache_efficiency{instance=~"$instance", db="$db", type="block_cache_data_hit"}[1m])) + sum(rate(edb_engine_cache_efficiency{instance=~"$instance", db="$db", type="block_cache_data_miss"}[1m])))

sum(rate(edb_engine_cache_efficiency{instance=~"$instance", db="$db", type="block_cache_filter_hit"}[1m])) / (sum(rate(edb_engine_cache_efficiency{instance=~"$instance", db="$db", type="block_cache_filter_hit"}[1m])) + sum(rate(edb_engine_cache_efficiency{instance=~"$instance", db="$db", type="block_cache_filter_miss"}[1m])))

sum(rate(edb_engine_cache_efficiency{instance=~"$instance", db="$db", type="block_cache_index_hit"}[1m])) / (sum(rate(edb_engine_cache_efficiency{instance=~"$instance", db="$db", type="block_cache_index_hit"}[1m])) + sum(rate(edb_engine_cache_efficiency{instance=~"$instance", db="$db", type="block_cache_index_miss"}[1m])))
